prompts: Create a playful ground-type Pokemon that loves to glide through the air with its wings.
I want to see a pink and blue Pokemon that can navigate through caves effortlessly.
Generate a unique Pokemon with strong claws and a cheerful expression, ready for adventure.
Make a whimsical creature that uses its wings to hover above the ground and explore.
Imagine a small, agile Pokemon with a knack for sneaking around in grassy areas.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing its vibrant colors and features.
Show me a mischievous Pokemon that loves to play tricks and glide through forests.
